title: Add note to CHANGES.txt that StreamingUpdateSolrServer is replaced by ConcurrentUpdateSolrServer
description: We encourage people to go to CHANGES.txt for problems, but this change is nowhere in that file. To find it I had to go back to 3.x source code and see the deprecation comment.

comments.author: Benson Margulies
comments.content: The necessary CHANGES.txt text is in the patch on SOLR-3298.
